name: kyw-website-beta
description: Know Your Worth (KYW) - Beta Website (Password Protected)

scripts.encrypt: npx staticrypt src/pages/index.html src/pages/big-idea.html src/pages/investors.html -p partners-counts-string-walls --short -d . --template-title "Know Your Worth - Beta" --remember 30 -t password_template.html
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run encrypt

author: zipperloo
